name: api_transport-click-send_get_collection
description: Retrieves the collection of TransportClickSend resources.

properties[].description: Allows you to reduce the response to contain only the properties you need. If your desired property is nested, you can address it using nested arrays. Example: properties[]={propertyName}&properties[]={anotherPropertyName}&properties[{nestedPropertyParent}][]={nestedProperty}

$block: The TransportClickSend resource is a collection of transports that carry dispatched alerts to the external ClickSend service.

$ul: **clickSendApiKey**: The API key for the ClickSend service. Stored in encrypted format.
**clickSendApiUsername**: The API username for the ClickSend service.
**clickSendFrom**: The from value for the ClickSend service.
**clickSendFromEmail**: The from email value where replies must be emailed for the ClickSend service.
**clickSendListId**: The recipient list ID value for the ClickSend service.
**clickSendSource**: The source method of sending value for the ClickSend service.
**createdAt**: When the resource instance was created. This date-time is in the UTC timezone.
**dataSegmentCode**: User-provided string on which to segment and filter data. Max 50 characters.
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource instance.
**partition**: The partition that contains this resource instance. The resource cannot be moved to another partition.
**resourceOwner**: The name of the person who owns this resource.
